Combat

Armor Proficiency: Light Weapon Proficiency: Simple
Armor: Padded Shield: None Weapons: Javelin (+7 1d6+1 R30/120); Quarterstaff (+7 1d8+1); Unarmed (+7 1+1)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Tough: +40 HP
Dark One's Blessing: Reducing foe to 0 HP gives self 21 temporary HP
Entropic Ward: May use Reaction to inflict Disadv on attack by foe; miss gives self Adv on next attack for 1 rd 1/short rest
Great Weapon Master: May make a bonus attack after crit or reducing foe to 0 HP/May suffer -5 attack w/a heavy weapon to gain +10 damage
Hurl Through Hell: After a successful attack, may inflict 10d10 HP psychic and cause foe to disappear for 1 rd 1/long rest
Lifedrinker: Pact weapon inflicts +1 HP necrotic
Pact Of The Chain: May forego one attack to allow familiar to use Reaction to attack
Polearm Master: Bonus attack w/polearm butt inflicts 1d4 HP bludgeoning/May take OA when a foe enters reach
Thirsting Blade: Attack action w/pact blade allows 2 attacks
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 7; Constitution: 2; Dexterity: 1; Intelligence: 4; Strength: 1; Wisdom: 7
Save Notes:
Beguiling Defenses: Immune to charm; may reflect onto caster (DC 15 Wisdom neg) for 1 min (damage ends)
Fiendish Resilience: May gain resistance to chosen damage type from non-magical and non-silver weapons until next short rest
Thought Shield: Immune to telepathy/Has resistance to psychic damage, and psychic damage also affects attacker
Magic
Spell Slots: C0: 2; C1: 1; K0: 4; K5: 4 Attack: C: 7; K: 7 Spell DC: C: 15; K: 15
Spells:
Alter Self (K2 [Master Of Myriad Forms] Tran): Self becomes aquatic, looks different, or gains natural weapons for conc or 1 hr
Arcane Eye (K4 [Visions Of Distant Realms] Divi): R30' Self sees through remote invisible eye w/darkvision that moves 30'/rd for conc or 1 hr
Bane (K1 [Thief Of Five Fates] Ench): R30' 3 targets suffer -1d4 on attacks and saving throws (Charisma neg) for conc or 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Bestow Curse (K3 [Sign Of Ill Omen] Necr): Touched suffers choice of Disadv on specified ability rolls, Disadv on attacks on self, require Wisdom save to take any action, or +1d8 HP necrotic from self attacks (Wisdom neg) for conc or 1 min [+Level extends duration to conc or 10 min/8 hr/24 hr/permanent at level 4/5/7/9]
Chill Touch (K0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Compulsion (K4 [Bewitching Whispers] Ench): R30' Self controls target movement (Wisdom neg) for conc or 1 min
Confusion (K4 [Dreadful Word] Ench): R90' Creatures in 10' radius randomly 10% wander/50% do nothing/20% attack adjacent/20% act normally (Wisdom neg) for conc or 1 min [+Level increases radius +5']
Conjure Elemental (K5 [Minions Of Chaos] Conj): R90' Summons obedient environment-appropriate CR 5 elemental for conc or 1 hr [+Level summons +1 CR]
Contact Other Plane (K5 Divi): Self contact w/extraplanar being inflicts 6d6 HP psychic and insanity until long rest (DC 15 Intelligence neg and receive 5 one-word answers)
Detect Magic (K1 [Eldritch Sight] Divi): R30' Self senses magic auras for conc or 10 min
Detect Poison And Disease (C1 Divi): R30' Self senses poison for conc or 10 min
Disguise Self (K1 [Mask Of Many Faces] Illu): Self clothing and body appear different for 1 hr
Dream (K5 Illu): Touched communicates via dreams of known target
False Life (K1 [Fiendish Vigor] Necr): Self gains 1d4+4 temporary HP for 1 hr [+Level gives +5 HP]
Find Familiar (K1 [Pact Of The Chain] Conj): R10' Self gains service from summoned spirit in animal form
Flame Strike (K5 [The Fiend] Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 4d6 HP fire and 4d6 HP radiant (Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP fire or radiant]
Friends (K0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Charisma w/target for conc or 1 min
Hold Monster (K5 Ench): R90' Immobilizes target (Wisdom neg) for conc or 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Hold Monster (K5 [Chains Of Carceri] Ench): R90' Immobilizes target (Wisdom neg) for conc or 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Jump (K1 [Otherworldly Leap] Tran): Touched gains triple jump distance for 1 min
Levitate (K2 [Ascendant Step] Tran): R60' Target floats (Constitution neg) for conc or 10 min
Mage Armor (K1 [Armor Of Shadows] Abju): Touched gains AC 13 + DexMod in no armor for 8 hr
Minor Illusion (K0 Illu): R30' Creates sound of 1 creature or 5' cu image (Investigation disbelieve) for 1 min
Poison Spray (K0 Conj): R10' Target suffers 4d12 HP poison (Constitution neg)
Polymorph (K4 [Sculptor Of Flesh] Tran): R60' Transforms target creature (Wisdom neg) for conc or 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Sacred Flame (C0 Evoc): R60' Target suffers 4d8 HP radiant (Dexterity neg)
Silent Image (K1 [Misty Visions] Illu): R60' Creates 15' cu illusion (Investigation neg) for conc or 10 min
Slow (K3 [Mire The Mind] Tran): R120' 6 targets in 40' cu suffer half Speed, -2 AC and Dexterity saves, and 1 action/rd (Wisdom neg) for conc or 1 min
Speak With Animals (K1 [Beast Speech] Divi): Self talks to animals for 10 min
Speak With Dead (K3 [Whispers Of The Grave] Necr): Self asks corpse 5 questions
Thaumaturgy (C0 Tran): R30' Creates minor magic effects for 1 min
Magic Notes:
Eldritch Invocations: 8 selections
Magic Initiate (Cleric): Knows 2 C0 spells/May cast 1 C1 spell/long rest
Agonizing Blast: Eldritch Blast inflicts +1 HP
Armor Of Shadows: May cast self Mage Armor at will
Ascendant Step: May cast self Levitate at will
Beast Speech: May cast Speak With Animals at will
Bewitching Whispers: May use a Warlock spell slot to cast Compulsion 1/long rest
Book Of Ancient Secrets: May inscribe spell rituals in a Book Of Shadows
Chains Of Carceri: May cast Hold Monster at will on celestials, elementals, and fiends 1/long rest per creature
Create Thrall: Touch charms incapacitated humanoid and allows telepathic communication
Dark Delirium: R60' Target charmed or frightened and unaware of surroundings (DC 15 Wisdom neg) for conc or 1 min 1/short rest
Dreadful Word: May use a Warlock spell slot to cast Confusion 1/long rest
Eldritch Master: May regain expended spell slots 1/long rest
Eldritch Sight: May cast Detect Magic at will
Eldritch Spear: Increases Eldritch Blast range to 300'
Fey Presence: R10' May inflict choice of charmed or frightened (DC 15 Wisdom neg) for 1 rd 1/short rest
Fiendish Vigor: May cast self False Life at will
Gaze Of Two Minds: Touch allows self to perceive through the senses of a willing humanoid for 1 rd
Mask Of Many Faces: May cast Disguise Self at will
Master Of Myriad Forms: May cast Alter Self at will
Minions Of Chaos: May use a Warlock spell slot to cast Conjure Elemental 1/long rest
Mire The Mind: May use a Warlock spell slot to cast Slow 1/long rest
Misty Escape: After taking damage, may use Reaction to teleport 60' and become invisible for 1 rd (attacking or casting ends) 1/short rest
Misty Visions: May cast Silent Image at will
Mystic Arcanum: May cast chosen K6, K7, K8, K9 spells 1/long rest
One With Shadows: May become invisible in dim light (moving or taking an action ends)
Otherworldly Leap: May cast self Jump at will
Pact Of The Blade: May use an action to conjure a magic weapon or use a 1 hr ritual to make a magic weapon summonable
Pact Of The Chain: Can cast Find Familiar as a ritual
Pact Of The Tome: Has a Book Of Shadows containing 3 chosen cantrips that can be cast at will
Repelling Blast: May have Eldritch Blast inflict 10' push
Sculptor Of Flesh: May use a Warlock spell slot to cast Polymorph 1/long rest
Sign Of Ill Omen: May use a Warlock spell slot to cast Bestow Curse 1/long rest
Thief Of Five Fates: May use a warlock spell slot to cast Bane 1/long rest
Visions Of Distant Realms: May cast Arcane Eye at will
Whispers Of The Grave: May cast Speak With Dead at will
